definition: school/sect/purpose/model/ancestor/clan/to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work)/classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: The merchants realized that it was important to expand the clan influence if they wanted to get wealthy.
sentences.chinese: 商人認識到擴大宗族勢力與自身致富有直接的關係。

sentences.english: The seventh lot came out for the tribe of Dan, clan by clan.
sentences.chinese: 爲但支派，按着宗族，拈出第七鬮。

sentences.english: The sons of Gerson also were numbered by the kindreds and houses of their fathers.
sentences.chinese: 革爾雄的子孫，依照宗族和家系登了記。

sentences.english: So were the People of Noah before them for they wickedly transgressed.
sentences.chinese: 以前，我毀滅了努哈的宗族，他們確是悖逆的民衆。

sentences.english: The men listed above by name were leaders of their clans. Their families increased greatly
sentences.chinese: 以上所記的人名都是作族長的，他們宗族的人數增多。

sentences.english: The second lot came out for the tribe of Simeon, clan by clan.
sentences.chinese: 爲西緬支派的人，按着宗族，拈出第二鬮。

sentences.english: These are the boundaries around the people of Judah by their clans.
sentences.chinese: 這是猶大人按着宗族所得之地四圍的交界。

sentences.english: Weijin and Northern and Southern Dynasties is the prosperous period of the patriarchal clan in the Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 魏晉南北朝時期是中國歷史上宗族強盛的時期。

sentences.english: To form the Wu Chien reflect the place of non-clan-based society.
sentences.chinese: 從而形成了吳簡所反映的非宗族化的地方社會。

sentences.english: The fifth lot came out for the tribe of Asher, clan by clan.
sentences.chinese: 爲亞設支派，按着宗族，拈出第五鬮。

sentences.english: The sixth lot came out for Naphtali, clan by clan.
sentences.chinese: 爲拿弗他利人，按着宗族，拈出第六鬮。

sentences.english: The fourth lot came out for Issachar, clan by clan.
sentences.chinese: 爲以薩迦人，按着宗族，拈出第四鬮。

sentences.english: Constructing cemeteries for clansmen and cemeteries for persons alive shall be strictly prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 嚴禁修建宗族墓地和修建活人墓。

sentences.english: The rural clan force has been changed in history for thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 農村宗族勢力在數千年的歷史中發生着變遷。

sentences.english: Besides, the internal organization of Chaozhou Community has the notion of clanism as its core.
sentences.chinese: 第二，潮幫內部組織是以宗族觀念爲核心的。

sentences.english: This was the inheritance of the tribe of the Simeonites, clan by clan.
sentences.chinese: 這是西緬支派按着宗族所得的地業。

definition: relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
imperial clan/member of the imperial clan/clansman/ancestral shrine
land-owning class, esp. during Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties 魏晉南北朝|魏晋南北朝
to continue/to continue a family line/posterity/heir
collateral relative (descended from a common ancestor but through different lines)
